en: Jehovah, how are mine adversaries increased! Many are they that rise up against me.
hmr: LALPA, a mi dotuhai hi an va pung ta de! A mi hung thawtuhai hi tamtak an nih;

en: Many there are that say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. [Selah
hmr: “Pathiena chun a ta dingin ṭhangpuina hrim a um nawh,” tia, Ka hringna chungchâng thu hriltu tamtak an um.

en: But thou, O Jehovah, art a shield about me; My glory, and the lifter up of my head.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, aw LALPA, nang chu ka vêlin ka phaw i na, Ka ropuina le ka lu dawm kângtu i nih.

en: I cry unto Jehovah with my voice, And he answereth me out of his holy hill. [Selah
hmr: Ka râwlin LALPA chu ka ko a, A tlâng inthienga inthawk chun a mi hung dawn hlak a.

en: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for Jehovah sustaineth me.
hmr: Kei chu ka zâl chu ka lo ininnghil tah a; Ka hang har nâwk a, LALPA chun a mi lo chel zing hlak a nih.

en: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of the people That have set themselves against me round about.
hmr: Mi sîng khat khawm hi ṭi naw ning, Kei mi hung doa, mi hung inhuol vêltuhai hi.

en: Arise, O Jehovah; save me, O my God: For thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon the cheek bone; Thou hast broken the teeth of the wicked.
hmr: Aw LALPA, tho la, aw ka Pathien; mi sandam rawh! Ka hmêlmahai po po bekbawra chun i benpêk tâwl ta sih a; Mi rilohai hahai chu i suk- tlam a.

en: Salvation belongeth unto Jehovah: Thy blessing be upon thy people. [Selah
hmr: Sandamna chu LALPA ta a na, I malsâwmna chu i mihai chungah um raw se.
